meanings.definition: To indulge in an activity, especially eating, to excess.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I binged on cookies and cake at the party.
meanings.sent2: She often binged on junk food when feeling stressed.
meanings.sent3: After the competition, the team binged on pizza to celebrate their win.
meanings.sent4: His love for sweets was so strong, it felt like he binged on sugar every day.
meanings.sent5: The image of him binging on ice cream late at night stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A period of excessive indulgence in an activity, especially eating.
meanings.sent1: Last weekend, I had a big binge on all my favorite snacks.
meanings.sent2: Her binge on fast food left her feeling guilty the next day.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unexpected binge on tuna cans made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The binge of rain during the storm caused flooding in the streets.
meanings.sent5: The holiday season always brings a binge of delicious treats and desserts.
